message: "Good morning, I took 10 units of long-acting insulin before bed last night at around 10:30 PM. This morning, I administered 5 units of rapid-acting insulin with my breakfast at 7:00 AM."

"Hey doc, I've been noticing some increased thirst and frequent urination lately. I'm also experiencing some mild dizziness. My blood sugar levels have been consistently hovering around 250 mg/dL. I think I might need to adjust my insulin dosage. Can you please help me review my current medication plan and offer any suggestions?"
